Template.Description: Creates a common organelle library which can be used within its package but also by other packages.
Template.TargetFolderHint: Choose the organelle folder of a package as target folder.

MacroDefinition.Name: PACKAGE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the package which contains the common organelle library. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: LIBRARY_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the common organelle library. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: UND_LIBRARY_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the library without prefix like 'vvv_'. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: COPYRIGHT
MacroDefinition.Description: The copyright string for the file headers.
